question: You recently stayed in a hotel in a large city. The weather was very unusual for the time of year and the heating / cooling system in the hotel was quite inadequate.Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter:give details of what went wrongexplain what you had to do to overcome the problem at the timesay what action you would like the manager to take
text: I am writing this to bring your attention to a bad experience that I had during my last stay at your hotel.

To begin with, I arrived at your hotel on the 24th of May  and stayed in room 224. At that time, the weather was a little bit unusual, and it was almost 6 degrees Celcius. So, switched on the heater, but it got broke several times.

I had to call room service on numerous occasions, even in the middle of midnight. This happened throughout the week, and it was so unpleasant. Anyway, in the second-day service team bought me a portable heater.

Since I am a regular visitor to your hotel, I kindly request you to do an investigation about this incident, furthermore, if you are comfortable with sharing your observations, I request you to do so.
I would appreciate your immediate attention to this matter, and I look forward to hearing from you.
